mapper.select: SELECT HBC.COMPANY_CD , HBC.CLIENT_CO_CODE , HBC.BIZ_HNAME , HBC.BIZ_ENAME , HBC.BIZ_NO FROM HR_BIZ_CLIENT HBC WHERE HBC.COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} AND HBC.CLIENT_CO_CODE = #{CLIENT_CODE}

SELECT HU.COMPANY_CD ,HU.MEMBER_NO ,HU.NAME ,HU.PWD ,HU.USER_GBN ,HU.COMPANY_NM ,HU.DEPT_NAME ,HU.JIKWI_NM ,HU.TEL_NO1 ,HU.TEL_NO2 ,HU.TEL_NO3 ,HU.HANDPHONE1 ,HU.HANDPHONE2 ,HU.HANDPHONE3 ,HU.FAX1 ,HU.FAX2 ,HU.FAX3 ,HU.EMAIL ,HU.NOTE ,HU.USE_YN ,HU.IP_ADDR ,HU.LOGIN_DT ,HU.REGI_DT ,HU.REGI_NO ,HU.MODI_DT ,HU.MODI_NO FROM HR_USER HU WHERE HU.COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} AND HU.MEMBER_NO = #{MEMBER_NO}
SELECT VZC.ZIP_NO , VZC.SIDO , VZC.GUGUN , VZC.DONG , VZC.BUNJI , VZC.SEQ FROM V_ZIP_CODE VZC WHERE VZC.ZIP_NO = #{ZIP_NO}

SELECT ROWNUM RN, VZC.ZIP_NO CODE, VZC.SIDO||'도 '||VZC.GUGUN||' '||DONG||' '||VZC.BUNJI NAME, SUBSTR(VZC.ZIP_NO,0,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(VZC.ZIP_NO,4) ZIP_NO , SUBSTR(VZC.ZIP_NO,0,3) ZIP1, SUBSTR(VZC.ZIP_NO,4) ZIP2 , VZC.SIDO , VZC.GUGUN , VZC.DONG , VZC.ADDRESS , VZC.BUNJI , VZC.SEQ, #{POPUP_GBN} POPUP_GBN, -- ExtJS Window Popup일 경우. #{FORMNAME} FORM_OBJ_NAME, #{OBJNAME} OBJ_NAME, #{P_ACTION_FLAG} P_ACTION_FLAG FROM V_ZIP_CODE VZC WHERE 1=1 AND REPLACE(UPPER(VZC.ADDRESS),' ','') LIKE '%'|| REPLACE(UPPER(#{ADDRESS}),' ','')||'%'

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM V_HR_DEPT HD WHERE 1=1 AND COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND UPPER(REPLACE(HD.DEPT_NAME,' ','')) LIKE '%'||UPPER(REPLACE(#{DEPT_NAME},' ',''))||'%'
AND HD.DEPT_LEVEL = #{DEPT_LEVEL}
AND UPPER(REPLACE(HD.DEPT_CD,' ','')) LIKE '%'||UPPER(REPLACE(#{DEPT_CD},' ',''))||'%'
